root.name: International Running Stars
root.description: OverviewInternational Running Stars is a 2012 running Videogame for PC and Mac developed and published by Alpes Soft. The game is available for digital purchase and in DVD format at its official website.About the gameInternational Running Stars gives the oportunity of living the life of a professional runner taking part of marathons and half marathons. The player can customize his characther and choose between 230 countries to play with. There are 3 game modes that are Career Mode, Quick Race and Training.In the Career Mode the player can create his runner and live the life of a professional runner taking part of differents events to get to the podium and win medals, the player can choose between running in Marathon cathegory (42 Kilometers) or Half Marathon cathegory (21 Kilometers). In the Quick Race Mode the player can immediately start to race in a random event of Marathon or Half Marathon. and in the Training Mode the player can train and learn about the movements of the runner.The game also features optional Facebook linking options.
